meanings.sent1: The equipper handed out tools to the workers.
meanings.sent2: The equipper in the store helped customers find the right camping gear.
meanings.sent3: The equipper at the party was like a superhero with a utility belt full of supplies.
meanings.sent4: She was the equipper of knowledge, always ready to share wisdom with others.
meanings.sent5: The equipper's role was crucial in ensuring everyone had what they needed for the project.

meanings.definition: To provide with necessary items or equipment.
meanings.sent1: The teacher will equipper the students with textbooks for the new semester.
meanings.sent2: It is important to equipper yourself with safety gear before starting the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The chef decided to equipper the kitchen with state-of-the-art appliances for efficiency.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like tools that could equipper the mind for any challenge.
meanings.sent5: The team leader made sure to equipper each member with the right skills for the task ahead.
